data_structure.description: Korean profanity database with cultural context and romanization

entry_format.romanized: Romanized version using Revised Romanization of Korean
entry_format.severity: Severity level (1-4) adjusted for Korean cultural context
entry_format.variations: Hangul variations, abbreviations, and romanized forms
entry_format.target_type: Whether it targets individuals, groups, or is general
entry_format.respect_violation: Whether it violates Korean respect hierarchy

cultural_context.hierarchy_importance: Korean society emphasizes age, status, and family hierarchy
cultural_context.nunchi_system: Social awareness and context reading crucial for appropriateness
cultural_context.confucian_influence: Confucian values prioritize family honor and social harmony
cultural_context.internet_culture: Korean online gaming and social media have unique slang patterns

words.context_notes: Mild insult meaning 'fool' or 'stupid', commonly used even affectionately
